trans-unit.source: Provides the event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected" /> events of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para los eventos <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected" /> y <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the capabilities of the Web Parts control set, it is possible to create a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Con las capacidades del conjunto de controles de elementos Web, es posible crear una conexión entre dos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> u otros controles de servidor, con un control que actúa como el proveedor y el otro actúa como consumidor de datos.

trans-unit.source: To form a connection, the two controls must reside in a zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control), and they must be designed correctly to share data through a common interface.
trans-unit.target: Para formar una conexión, los dos controles deben residir en una zona que hereda de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> clase (como el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control), y deben diseñarse correctamente para compartir datos a través de una interfaz común.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las conexiones de elementos Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> y [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class passes event data to methods that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegate to handle events.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> clase pasa los datos de eventos a los métodos que utilizan el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegado para controlar los eventos.

trans-unit.source: There are two such connection-related methods that raise events and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class to provide event data.
trans-unit.target: Existen dos tales métodos relacionados con la conexión que generar eventos y utilizar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> clase para proporcionar datos de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Both are members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Ambos son miembros de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event after two server controls have successfully connected, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event after two server controls have been disconnected.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> método genera el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> evento después de que se han conectado correctamente dos controles de servidor y el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> método genera el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> evento después de haberse desconectados dos controles de servidor.

trans-unit.source: Developers can create custom event handler methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> events, and in those methods, they can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class to access details of a connection.
trans-unit.target: Los programadores pueden crear eventos personalizados a los métodos de control para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> eventos, y en estos métodos, puede usar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> clase a los detalles de acceso de una conexión.

trans-unit.source: For example, a developer can declare the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute on the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assign to it a custom method name that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, puede declarar un desarrollador la `OnWebPartsConnected` del atributo en el `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento y asígnele un nombre de método personalizado que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: In the custom handler method, developers can access the details of a connection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> object that is passed to the method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: En el método de controlador personalizado, los desarrolladores pueden acceder a los detalles de una conexión usando la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> objeto que se pasa al método como parámetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class has two overloads of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> clase tiene dos sobrecargas del constructor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor is the default; it initializes the property values for the class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor es el valor predeterminado; inicializa los valores de propiedad de la clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor calls the default constructor, and then it also initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor llama al constructor predeterminado y, a continuación, también inicializa el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class has several properties, all of which refer to the essential aspects of a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> clase tiene varias propiedades, todas ellas hacen referencia a los aspectos fundamentales de una conexión de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property refers to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object that represents the entire connection.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> propiedad hace referencia a la categoría asociada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto que representa toda la conexión.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control acting as the provider in the connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> referencias de propiedad un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> u otro control de servidor que actúa como el proveedor en la conexión y el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> referencias de propiedad un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> o control de servidor que actúa como el consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the connection's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> propiedad hace referencia a la conexión <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> objeto, mientras que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> referencias de propiedad el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: Control que actúa como proveedor.

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: Punto de conexión del proveedor.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Control que actúa como consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: Punto de conexión del consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs" /> class without requiring a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs" /> sin necesidad de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Éste es el constructor predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: It does not require a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: No requiere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the values of its properties by assigning each of its connection-related parameter objects to the corresponding property.
trans-unit.target: El constructor inicializa los valores de sus propiedades mediante la asignación de cada uno de sus objetos de parámetro relacionado con la conexión a la propiedad correspondiente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o control de servidor que actúa como proveedor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> de la conexión.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o control de servidor que actúa como consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> de la conexión.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase utilizando el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object is available.
trans-unit.target: Esta versión de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor se utiliza cuando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> el objeto está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> de la conexión actual.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object contains all the details of a Web Parts connection, including references to the provider control, the provider's connection point, the consumer control, and the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto contiene todos los detalles de una conexión de elementos Web, incluidas las referencias para el control de proveedor, punto de conexión del proveedor, el control de consumidor y punto de conexión del consumidor.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las conexiones de elementos Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, y [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que actúa como consumidor en la conexión.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que actúa como consumidor.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Una conexión entre los controles en una zona de elementos Web requiere un control para que actúe como el proveedor y otro para que actúe como el consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada control debe tener también un punto de conexión definido; en el caso del consumidor, el punto de conexión debe ser un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las conexiones de elementos Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, y [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> de la conexión actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> de la conexión actual.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Una conexión entre los controles en una zona de elementos Web requiere un control para que actúe como el proveedor y otro para que actúe como el consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada control debe tener también un punto de conexión definido; en el caso del consumidor, el punto de conexión debe ser un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las conexiones de elementos Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, y [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que actúa como proveedor en la conexión.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que actúa como proveedor.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Una conexión entre los controles en una zona de elementos Web requiere un control para que actúe como el proveedor y otro para que actúe como el consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada control debe tener también un punto de conexión definido; en el caso del proveedor, el punto de conexión debe ser un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las conexiones de elementos Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, y [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> de la conexión actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> de la conexión actual.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Una conexión entre los controles en una zona de elementos Web requiere un control para que actúe como el proveedor y otro para que actúe como el consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada control debe tener también un punto de conexión definido; en el caso del proveedor, el punto de conexión debe ser un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las conexiones de elementos Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, y [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
